page.title: 08COMMUNITY CLUB
page.content:
The{Community Club}is held in the school twice a week for 6 months. The main event is{bowling.}It is held in the main school.{Darts}is held in the infant class. The bowling mats stay in a shed outside. Bowlers have many {competitions}to play. For example the {under 18's.}Capt. of the under 18's is {Russel Wiseman.}The winner of the darts is{Fergus Henderson.}When all the competitions have been played there is a{Dinner and Dance.}Most members and other people buy tickets. The Dance is held in{Turriff}in the {oak.}This is a small hotel. If you had won a competitions you are given a {trophy}or{cup}at the Dance.
{BRIAN CLARK (AGE 10)
